item.title: Send my friend a pie?
item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded:
HELLO:)
I want to send the friend a chocolate pie, my friend in Canada in city Toronto I from Azerbaijan. The order for the house. It is possible?
You can send me a photo of your pies? I am sorry me for mine English, I communicate with you with help of the program of the interpreter thanks :)
Seva
--from the Recipezaar mailbox
